A powerful extension for your web content

WebApps is a Plugin driven Block ('widget') creator. It can be used as a flexible addition to any CMS, VLE, WordPress or SharePoint site that allows for HTML input.

Open Source

All of our source code is availble for you to view, scrutinise, correct and submit!

Extendable

WebApps is Plugin driven and fully extendable! If you can think it, it can be done!

Use anywhere

WebApps is designed to integrate with as many solutions as possible as it delivers simple HTML embed code for your WordPress, HTML or SharePoint site, CMS or VLE!

Open Source Code

Our Plugins engine makes extending WebApps a breeze. We provide full documentation for developers. All Plugins are verified for security before being published into the WebApps Studio Marketplace!

As whatever you create is delivered in an iFrame, WebApps is compatible with almost every Content Management System, Virtual Learning Environment, WordPress Website, SharePoint Website or a standard HTML Website!

Get WebApps Here!

I'm a developer, can I extend WebApps?

WebApps has powerful a framework that makes it easy for developers to create sophisticated Apps that could extend the realms of possibility into virtually unlimited directions.

See Developer Documentation

Get Started

In order to get started with WebApps, simply Download the latest version from GitHub and follow the instructions in our Documentation!
